nsubj spent man	13.431912122015953
nmod:with spent son	13.431912122015953
case son with	10.173815583994472
dobj spent time	9.647722488097692
nmod:poss time his	8.96600400336137
nmod:poss son his	8.408031601169677
punct spent .	7.721485104641084
root ROOT spent	7.711600345408542
det man A	7.193587496976445
